languages.text: {n}Присмотревшись, вы понимаете, что каждый аугмент будто бы начал... мутировать, пытаясь развить в себе новые, не предусмотренные создателями формы и функции. Вероятно, это и убило несчастных техножриц.{/n}

{n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Присмотревшись, вы понимаете, что каждый аугмент будто бы начал... мутировать, пытаясь развить в себе новые, не предусмотренные создателями формы и функции. Вероятно, это и убило несчастных техножриц.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seem to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}

{n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}

languages.text: {n}经过仔细观察，你发现这些植入物似乎发生了……变异，自行发展出了设计者未曾设想过的新形式与新功能，这很可能就是这两位祭司的死因。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}经过仔细观察，你发现这些植入物似乎发生了……变异，自行发展出了设计者未曾设想过的新形式与新功能，这很可能就是这两位祭司的死因。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après inspection, vous réalisez que leurs augmétiques ont commencé à... muter, en développant de nouvelles formes et fonctions qui n'avaient pas été prévues par leurs créateurs. C'est très certainement la cause de leur mort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après inspection, vous réalisez que leurs augmétiques ont commencé à... muter, en développant de nouvelles formes et fonctions qui n'avaient pas été prévues par leurs créateurs. C'est très certainement la cause de leur mort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}よく見てみると、どのオーグメントも変異を始めているようだった…創造主が想定していなかった新しい形や機能を開発している。それが彼女たちの死を招いたのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}よく見てみると、どのオーグメントも変異を始めているようだった…創造主が想定していなかった新しい形や機能を開発している。それが彼女たちの死を招いたのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras examinarlo de cerca, te das cuenta de que todos los aumentos parecían haberse puesto... a mutar y desarrollar formas y funciones nuevas que no tenían pensadas sus creadores. Seguramente esto sea lo que causó su defunción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras examinarlo de cerca, te das cuenta de que todos los aumentos parecían haberse puesto... a mutar y desarrollar formas y funciones nuevas que no tenían pensadas sus creadores. Seguramente esto sea lo que causó su defunción».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem du näher hingesehen hast, wird dir klar, dass jede einzelne Augmentation begonnen hat, zu ... mutieren, neue Formen und Funktionen zu entwickeln, die von den Schöpfern nicht vorgesehen waren. Vermutlich ist dies die Ursache für ihr Ableben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem du näher hingesehen hast, wird dir klar, dass jede einzelne Augmentation begonnen hat, zu ... mutieren, neue Formen und Funktionen zu entwickeln, die von den Schöpfern nicht vorgesehen waren. Vermutlich ist dies die Ursache für ihr Ableben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yakından incelediğinde her bir ogmentin... Mutasyona uğramaya başladığını fark ediyorsun. Yaratıcılarının planlamadığı yeni şekillere ve işlevlere bürünür olmuşlar. Kadınların ölüm nedeninin bu olabileceğini düşünüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After taking a closer look, you realise that every augment seems to have begun... mutating, developing new forms and functions not envisioned by their creators. It seems probable that this is what caused their demise.{/n}
